amendment.description: To strike the provision for raising the debt limit.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2797 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 54. Record Vote Number: 57.

action.text: Amendment SA 2797 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2675-2676; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2675) To strike the provision for raising the debt limit.
